mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tuser ( userid, passwd, username, email, indate ) VALUES ( #{ userid }, #{ passwd }, #{ username }, #{ email }, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, EMAIL, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INDATE FROM TUSER ORDER BY USERID
SELECT USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, EMAIL, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') INDATE FROM TUSER WHERE USERID = #{ userid }
